text: National Institutions House () is the house of the national Zionist institutions of Israel. It was built in 1930, and is located in Jerusalem. Next to it is a memorial to victims of Antisemitism around the world, that was built in 2008. == Other websites == * The National Institutions House in the Haganah website. Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem Category:1930 establishments in Asia Category:1930s establishments in Israel
title: National Institutions House
